@pickled egg

It's not a DVD rip converted to anything.  Read the title, it's a TS (telesync).  A movie that is filmed with a camera, in this case a HD one.  A TS is always shitty quality compared to a DVD rip or anything else.  This release is probably watchable but I don't ruin movies by watching a TS unless I really want to see the movie bad.

Go to the links below to learn about the movie types before you download movies:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Telesync

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pirated_movie_release_types

You're right nittany, this is not a DVD rip converted to 720p.
It's the poor quality TS that's claiming to be a DVD rip that has been converted to 720p

If you download the 1.4Gig version that says DVDRip it is actually slightly better quality than this converted version

...I also completely fail to see what benefit can be obtained by converting the TS to 720p.
Waste of time and bandwidth as far as I am concerned.
And I doubt the TS was 720p to begin with 'cos it sure don't look like it.
